00032 /**
00033  * @brief  A class for storing probe intensity data.
00034  *
00035  */
00036 class CNProbe
00037 {
00038 private:
00039   int m_iProbeSetIndex;
00040   char m_cAllele;
00041   unsigned int m_uiProbeID;
00042   float m_fIntensity;
00043   float m_fResidual;
00044   double m_dProbeEffect;
00045   bool m_bUseForSketch;
00046   float m_fMedianIntensity;
00047   float m_fPredictedIntensity;
00048   short m_nPDNNBin;
00049 
00050 public:
00051   /**
00052    * Constructor.
00053   */
00054   CNProbe();
00055   void setProbeSetIndex(int i) { m_iProbeSetIndex = i; }
00056   int getProbeSetIndex() { return m_iProbeSetIndex; }
00057   void setAllele(char c) { m_cAllele = c; }
00058   char getAllele() { return m_cAllele; }
00059   void setProbeID(unsigned int ui) { m_uiProbeID = ui; }
00060   unsigned int getProbeID() { return m_uiProbeID; }
00061   void setIntensity(float f) { m_fIntensity = f; }
00062   float getIntensity() { return m_fIntensity; }
00063   void setResidual(float f) { m_fResidual = f; }
00064   float getResidual() { return m_fResidual; }
00065   void setProbeEffect(double d) { m_dProbeEffect = d; }
00066   double getProbeEffect() { return m_dProbeEffect; }
00067   bool isUseForSketch() { return m_bUseForSketch; }
00068   void setUseForSketch(bool b) { m_bUseForSketch = b; }
00069   void setMedianIntensity(float f) { m_fMedianIntensity = f; }
00070   float getMedianIntensity() { return m_fMedianIntensity; }
00071   void setPredictedIntensity(float f) { m_fPredictedIntensity = f; }

00075 
00076   /**
00077    * Compare function.
00078    * @param that - A reference to an instance of this class.
00079    * @param iCompareCode - The code to switch on when doing compares. (Each code is a different compare.)
00080    * @return - int value. (-1 if *this < that, 0 if *this == that, 1 if *this > that)
00081   */
00082   int compareTo(CNProbe& that, int iCompareCode);
00083 
00084   template<int k> struct ComparePred {
00085       bool operator()(const CNProbe* lhs, const CNProbe* rhs) const {
00086           Err::errAbort("CNProbe: ComparePred instantiated with an invalid compare code = " + ToStr(k));
00087           return false;
00088       }
00089   };
00090 };
00091 
00092 template<> struct CNProbe::ComparePred<0> {
00093     bool operator()(const CNProbe* lhs, const CNProbe* rhs) const {
00094         int iCompareResult = 0;
00095         iCompareResult = AffxArray<int>::compare(lhs->m_iProbeSetIndex, rhs->m_iProbeSetIndex);
00096         if (iCompareResult == 0) {
00097             iCompareResult = AffxArray<char>::compare(lhs->m_cAllele, rhs->m_cAllele);
00098         }
00099         return iCompareResult < 0;
00100     }
00101 };
00102 template<> struct CNProbe::ComparePred<1> {
00103     bool operator()(const CNProbe* lhs, const CNProbe* rhs) const {
00104         return AffxArray<unsigned int>::compare(lhs->m_uiProbeID, rhs->m_uiProbeID) < 0;
00105     }
00106 };
00107 template<> struct CNProbe::ComparePred<2> {
00108     bool operator()(const CNProbe* lhs, const CNProbe* rhs) const {
00109         return AffxArray<int>::compare(lhs->m_iProbeSetIndex, rhs->m_iProbeSetIndex) < 0;
00110     }
00111 };
00112 template<> struct CNProbe::ComparePred<3> {
00113     bool operator()(const CNProbe* lhs, const CNProbe* rhs) const {
00114         int iCompareResult = 0;
00115         iCompareResult = AffxArray<int>::compare(lhs->m_iProbeSetIndex, rhs->m_iProbeSetIndex);
00116         if (iCompareResult == 0) {
00117             iCompareResult = AffxArray<char>::compare(lhs->m_cAllele, rhs->m_cAllele);
00118         }
00119         if (iCompareResult == 0) {
00120             iCompareResult = AffxArray<unsigned int>::compare(lhs->m_uiProbeID, rhs->m_uiProbeID);
00121         }
00122         return iCompareResult < 0;
00123     }
00124 };
